resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104010</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104010</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200291</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">A Family Disease</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Familie Krankheit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une Maladie de Famille</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma Doença Da Família</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una Malattia Della Famiglia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια οικογενειακή ασθένεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una Enfermedad De la Familia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This video segment from NOVA: "Cracking the Code of Life" explores the challenges and questions faced by women who have a strong family history of breast cancer, and who now have the option of being genetically tested for a disease that has no cure. Grades 9-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses videosegment vom NOVA: ", den Code 
des Lebens knackend", erforscht die Herausforderungen und die Fragen, 
die von den Frauen gegenübergestellt werden, die eine starke 
Familiengeschichte des Brustkrebses haben und die jetzt die Option von
auf eine Krankheit genetisch geprüft werden haben, die keine Heilung 
hat. Grade 9-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce segment visuel de NOVA : "fendant le code
de la vie" explore les défis et les questions débattus par les 
femmes qui ont des antécédents familiaux forts de cancer de sein, et
qui ont maintenant l'option génétiquement de l'test pour une maladie
qui n'a aucun traitement. Catégories 9-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este segmento video do NOVA: "rachando o 
código da vida" explora os desafios e as perguntas enfrentados pelas 
mulheres que têm um history de família forte do cancer de peito, e 
que têm agora a opção genetically de ser testado para uma doença 
que não tenha nenhuma cura. Classes 9-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo video segmento dal NOVA: "spezzando 
il codice di vita" esplora le sfide e le domande affrontate dalle 
donne che hanno una storia di famiglia forte del cancro di seno e che 
ora hanno l'opzione geneticamente di prova a malattia che non ha cura.
Gradi 9-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το τηλεοπτικό τμήμα μνήμης από τη NOVA: 
"Το ράγισμα του κώδικα της ζωήσ" ερευνά τις προκλήσεις και 
τις ερωτήσεις που αντιμετωπίζονται από τις γυναίκες που έχουν μια
ισχυρή οικογενειακή ιστορία του καρκίνου του μαστού, και που 
έχουν τώρα την προαιρετική δυνατότητα γενετικά της δοκιμής για 
μια ασθένεια που δεν έχει καμία θεραπεία. Βαθμοί 9-12.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este segmento video de la NOVA: "quebrando 
el código de la vida" explora los desafíos y las preguntas hechos 
frente por las mujeres que tienen antecedentes familiares fuertes del 
cáncer de pecho, y que ahora tienen la opción genético de la prueba
para una enfermedad que no tenga ninguna curación. Grados 9-12.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD

VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770200291</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104010</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
